- Present at Psy Chi

            5.	What is the title of your submission?

            6.	Briefly, what is the problem or major purpose of your research?
            
            7.	What procedures did you use?
            
            8.	What results did you expect? What did you find?
            
            9.	Briefly, what tables/figures do you plan to show?
            
            10.	Please list what references you already have (this can be a working list).
            
            11.	Please include a brief and thoughtful paragraph or two describing the importance of your research and its contribution to the field of psychology. Any personal interest in the topic may be included here.

#### Using `databraryapi` with PLAY pilot data
            
To install `databraryapi` from its [GitHub repository](https://github.com/PLAY-behaviorome/databraryapi) into your RStudio project:

```
devtools::install_github("PLAY-behaviorome/databraryapi")
```
            
```
# load databraryapi
library(databraryapi)
```
